ISSUE.TITLE: VisibleIndividually option ignored
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: - Set a product in the catalog so 'Visible individually' option is not selected. - Start the store where this product is available - In the search box or in the item by category list, the product appears when it should not Fix: - In Nop.Services\Catalog\ProductServices.cs, - In public virtual async Task<IPagedList<Product>> SearchProductsAsync - Check the value (after line 815) with the below code `if (visibleIndividuallyOnly) productsQuery = productsQuery.Where(p => p.VisibleIndividually);`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5693 Replaced caching of IPagedList to caching of List on HomepageBestSellersViewComponent

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5553 Added missed applying the visibleIndividuallyOnly filter option in the search products method
